name: Rapidly load YouTube （YouTube高速ローダー）
author: densuke

sections.description:
Just install this plug-in, speed up loading YouTube videos at your posts.

By converting embedded YouTube videos to thumbnail images, you can shorten the loading time.

There is a setting that can conditionally disable the plug-in.
* The number of embedded videos is within the setting value.
* Put inside some tag has “disablethum” class.

At Edit Post view, you can use QuickTag for div tag has “disablethum” class.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/speech-balloon-maker directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Tools’->’Speech Balloon Maker’ screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/speech-balloon-maker directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Tools’->’Speech Balloon Maker’ screen to configure the plugin
